title: mAyAvati
sahitya:
mAyAvati kaNDanollene avana mAyarANi pUje mADalArenakka


caraNam 1    hegala hasibeyoLagaTTa maDiyanuTTu gaganadindiLida gangeya tIradi 
ageya mruttikeya sarvAngakke lEpisi enage maiya toLeyalIsane bhraSTa ghODi
    caraNam 2    niSTeyindali sAlagrAma shIleya sampuSTadoLirisi pUjisu endare 
bhraSTaru kombuva madhya pAnava mADi jeTTidEviya pUje mADembOnakka
    caraNam 3    eLe tuLasi gange argyOdakadi nirmalavAgi pUjeya mADendare 
pILi nIra kuDidu battale bEvu uTTu huLi mUlangIruLLi timbuvane ghODi
    caraNam 4    haridinadupavAsa iruLali jAgara vara bhakutiyali Acarisendare 
huruLi gugguri mukki mEle majjige kuDidu hariya hebbu liyante nidriya ghODi
    caraNam 5    shrSTigadhikanAda varada shrI purandara viTTalana bhajane mADendare 
muSTi bhangiya tindu linga pUjeya mADi iSTa sallisutEnendeLeyuva ghODi
